DEFECT.DESCRIPTION: 'NonDelegatingQueryInterface' has an override at `c:\program files\microsoft sdks\windows\v7.1\samples\multimedia\directshow\baseclasses\combase.h(235)` and only the override is annotated for _Param_(2): when an override is annotated, the base (this function) should be similarly annotated.
